1:
The heavens declare the glory of God,\q and the skies make his handiwork known!
\q
2:
Day after day speech pours out;\q night after night it reveals knowledge.
\q
3:
There is no speech or spoken words;\q their voice is not heard.


\q
4:
Yet their words go out over all the earth,\q and their speech to the end of the world.
\q He has pitched a tent for the sun among them.
\q
5:
The sun is like a bridegroom coming out of his chamber\q and like a strong man who rejoices when he runs his race.
\q
7:
The law of Yahweh is perfect, restoring the soul;\q the testimony of Yahweh is reliable, making the simple wise.
\q
8:
The instructions of Yahweh are right, making the heart glad;\q the commandment of Yahweh is pure, bringing light to the eyes.


\q
9:
The fear of Yahweh is pure, enduring forever;\q the righteous decrees of Yahweh are true and altogether right!
\q
10:
They are of greater value than gold, even more than much fine gold;\q they are sweeter than honey and the dripping honey from the honeycomb.


\q
11:
Yes, by them your servant is warned;\q in obeying them there is great reward.
\q
12:
Who can discern all his own errors?\q Cleanse me from hidden faults.


\q
13:
Keep your servant also from arrogant sins;\q let them not rule over me.
\q Then I will be perfect,
\q and I will be innocent from many transgressions.
\q
14:
May the words of my mouth and the thoughts of my heart\q be acceptable in your sight,
\q Yahweh, my rock and my redeemer.
